Game information:

Independent Chilean developer ACE Team is Abyss Odyssey -
story game in the third person with a complex combat system.
Do the combo attacks, a series of attacks and explosions
in order to survive in a deadly battle. When you learn to
control your enemies, you will be able to use their skills
and fighting techniques. Levels change every time, from the
monsters that they are filled to the locations of merchants,
unique finds and treasures.

Repack Features:
